## Leaflet Widget

Create a map widget using the leaflet package on R

```{r}
library(leaflet)

m <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addMarkers(lng=-66.74041348869325, lat=18.468307266376055, popup="Mi Alma MaterğŸº")
```

## Mi alma mater

```{r, echo=FALSE}
m
```
